title: Retarded Champions
body: Ive noticed ever since maybe when Gnar came out riot has been making some retarded champs like Azir, spawn soldiers to attack you from far range and also slow you wtf is that and kalista, free jump per auto attack, oh and reksai free tp with tonnes of true damage and Gnar dont even get me started, his whole kit is stupid and mega Gnar that is so strong holy. But all your guys probs think nahh those champs are awesome but this is my opinion so calm down. Riot please go back to making champs like Rengar, Kha'Zix and Lucian yeah thank you.
